title: Lemon cupcakes with citrus syrup

ingredients.content: 1 lemon, zest only, no white pith
desiccated coconut, toasted or untoasted, for garnishing

preparations.content: Place 12 silicone cupcake moulds into Varoma dish and onto Varoma tray, then set Varoma aside.
Place sugar and lemon zest into mixing bowl and mill <b>10 sec/speed 9<b>.
Add eggs, egg yolk, flour and coconut milk and mix <b>8 sec/speed 5<b>.
Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula, then mix a further <b>4 sec/speed 5<b>. Fill cupcake moulds half-way, then set Varoma aside. Clean and dry mixing bowl.
Place water into mixing bowl. Set Varoma with cupcakes into position, secure Varoma lid and steam <b>22 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>.
Remove cupcakes and allow to cool. Clean and dry mixing bowl.
Place all syrup ingredients, except desiccated coconut, into mixing bowl and cook <b>3 min/90°C/speed 2<b>. Pour hot syrup over puddings, garnish with coconut and serve.

hintsAndTricks: <b>Gluten free option<b>: replace self-raising flour with 100 g almonds and 85 g coconut. Place almonds and coconut into mixing bowl and mill <b>10 sec/speed 7.<b> Add 20 g cornflour in step 4 with the eggs. Proceed as per recipe. Steaming time in step 5 may need to be extended by up to 5 minutes.
<b>Jam pudding:<b> Place ½ -1 tsp jam into the bottom of each mould before adding cupcake batter. Proceed as per recipe.
